node.contents: Please suggest on how this can to be handled. Is there any other way than keeping that application out of android app? Or how to allow an android app read with Java IO?

astNode.text: Please suggest on how this can to be handled. Is there any other way than keeping that application out of android app? Or how to allow an android app read with Java IO?

node.contents: You can have you file in /assets directory of your project and access it using your AssetManager class:

astNode.text: You can have you file in /assets directory of your project and access it using your AssetManager class:

elements.contents: AssetManager aMgr= context.getAssets(); InputStream ipStream = aMgr.open("filename.txt");

units.rawText: AssetManager aMgr= context.getAssets(); InputStream ipStream = aMgr.open("filename.txt");
